players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Bob seems suspicious to me, I'm not sure why."
Charlie: "Bob's silence is more suspicious than Alice's words."
Bob: "Bob is a good guy, I don't know what Alice is talking about."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso, I'm 100% sure."
